text: hi everyone today I will be making money
bow is the Vietnamese version of simple
fun
it's a super fluffy bun with pork eggs
and Chinese sausages and vegetables
feelings and we also show you how to
ship your money bow into these cute
little piggies are you excited let's
begin
firstly soak the dried mushrooms in
boiling hot water I'm using bulb Cesar
came mushrooms and wood ear mushrooms
about quarter cup each set aside for
about 15 minutes meanwhile we will make
the doll you're going to need not warm
milk sugar torch and driving some yeast
the milk will give our bun more flavor
and also make it more white in color but
if you don't like milk you can use water
instead just make sure the liquid is in
the form to eat the activities give it a
good stir and let it sit for about five
minutes in a mixing bowl mixing the a
purpose flour sugar and baking powder
make a hole in the middle and add in
vegetable oil and also the yeast mixer
mix well until the flower absorb all the
liquid after that neat well with your
hands for about 10 minutes until the
flower form into a smooth non sticky
piece of dough you can also knead the
dough in the stand mixer when the dough
is soft and smooth form it into a bowl
cover with a damp cloth and put it in a
warm place for about an hour or until
the dough doubles inside if you're
living in the cold place you can put it
in the oven with just the light on while
waiting for the dough to rise we can
make the feelings after having soft in
hot water for 15 minutes my mushrooms
have grown bigger I have washed it a few
times and grain then chop finely using a
food processor or wagon then mix the
chopped mushrooms with the mince pork we
can√°-- marinate the fillings with a
tablespoon of minced shallot a
tablespoon of oyster sauce 1 TSP sesame
oil I want my feelings to have a nice
char Sieu flavors so I'm going to use
some red port seasoning powder about 3
tbsp but that's just optional if you
don't have that you can use salt and
pepper
also adding about a tablespoon of minced
garlic 1/2 a cup guys onion you can add
in some vegetables to give the fillings
a little more crunch like carrots or
water chestnuts is all up to your
preference try not to do ingredients
with water or liquid in it because they
can make the bun less fluffy also add in
2 tbsp of tapioca starch to have all the
ingredients combined well give it a good
mix and let marinate for about 30
minutes
next good for heart boy eggs into half
slide three Chinese sausages Stingley
using diagonal cuts that's all we need
for the feelings
after rising for 45 minutes my door has
doubled in size transfer the dough to a
floured working surface liqui for a few
more minutes to remove all the gas add
in a few drops of lime juice and knead
well this will have to make the bun
whiter in color
form the dough into a lock and divide
into 8 equal pieces
share big piece into a small ball like
this cover with a damp cloth and let
them rest for another 10 more minutes
now take out one piece of dough flatten
it out into a disc with the half of your
palm and a rolling pin try to make the
outer part thinner than the center you
can shape the feelings into 8 equal
balls for me I choose you my ice cream
scoop place the fillings in the center
and arrange those Chinese sausages or
rabbit top up will have an hard boil
eggs then fall and seal into a symbol
like this
or like this it might take some practice
to make a nice bun and my buns are not
alway perfect in K it doesn't look so
pretty I can turn it over and make it
cuter using some leftover dough to shape
it into the ears the nose and the tail
of a cute piggy you can use whole
peppercorns or black beans or black
sesame to make the eyes look how cute is
that
cover the shape ones and let them rest
for about fifteen more minutes before
steaming remember to tie the lead of
your steamer with a kitchen towel to
avoid water from dripping into the bun
steam the buns for about 25 minutes and
they are ready to be served
while look how fluffy that is you can
wrap each bun in saran wrap and store it
in the fridge for a few days or in the
freezer for a few months before serving
on the next days you can microwave for
two minutes or steam again for five
minutes
is a perfect breakfast it's very
important that you let the dough rest
three times in a warm place as suggested
in the video in order to get these
fluffiness the fillings is well seasoned
and has the perfect combinations of
flavor and textures I hope you enjoyed
this tutorial don't forget to thumbs up
and subscribe thank you for watching
you
